songs.title: Heat (Niko the Kid Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Pre-Chorus]
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat, heat, heat, heat
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat from you, baby
I need more heat
I need more heat
Need more

[Chorus]
Oh, come turn this around
Oh, no, no, don't let us down
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
Oh, wanna feel alive
Oh, like my heart's in the wild
I need more heat from you, baby
Make me feel weak for you, baby
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat, heat, heat, heat
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat from you, baby
I need more heat
I need more heat
I need more heat from you
I need more heat from you
